#+title: Variable Standards

[[file:../README.org][‚Üê back to README]]

** Internal Parameters
- ~P~ - pressure
- ~u~ - velocity
- ~m~ - mass
- ~xb~ - boundary coordinates
- ~xc~ - center coordinates
- ~U~ - internal energy
- ~e~ - specific total energy
- ~rho~ - density
- ~p~ - momentum
- ~V~ - specific volume
  
- ~<var>_L~ - value on the left  boundary 
- ~<var>_R~ - value on the right boundary 
  
** Iterators
- ~i~ - space along X
- ~j~ - space along Y
- ~k~ - space along Z
- ~t_cur~ - current time
- ~step~ - current step

** Global Parameters
- ~gamma~ - adiabatic index
- ~cfl~ - Courant number
- ~c~ - speed of sound
- ~N~ - number of cells
- ~t_end~ - computation time
- ~L_x~, ~L_y~, ~L_z~ - computational domain size

** Miscellaneous
- ~solver~ - solver type
- ~writer~ - writer type
  
- ~left_bc~  - left  boundary condition
- ~right_bc~ - right boundary condition
